Dear Prank:
. 1 hayenft called you directly about your Committee
assignments for this next year, since I assume Harold discussed
the matter with you following the meeting he, Harry and I
had in Chicago.
However, for the record, let me say that I should be
very much pleased if you would serve as Chairman of the
Publications and of the Membership Committees in 1958. I
also should like to have you as a member of the Advisory
Committee to the President of the ETRC and of the Foundations
and Finance Committee.
